thread.title: Lisa Villalobos: CNBC "Closing Bell" Executive Producer

author: David A. Grogan
title: Lisa Villalobos: CNBC "Closing Bell" Executive Producer
text:
Lisa Villalobos: CNBC "Closing Bell" Executive Producer Published 11:35 AM ET Tue, 1 May 2018 Updated 1:36 PM ET Wed, 9 May 2018 CNBC.com Adam Jeffery | CNBC Lisa Villalobos
Lisa Villalobos was named Executive Producer of CNBC's signature show, Closing Bell , in April of 2015. She oversees production for the 3-5pm ET hours anchored by Kelly Evans and Wilfred Frost . The show includes coverage of the last, and often most volatile, hour of the trading day as well as all the breaking news released after the market close.
Prior to Closing Bell , Lisa was Executive Producer of Fast Money at 5pm ET. She joined CNBC in 2012 as a senior producer for Squawk on the Street .
Lisa joined CNBC from FOX Business where she helped launch multiple shows including Opening Bell, Countdown to the Closing Bell, Markets Now with Dagen McDowell & Connell McShane , and After the Bell . She served as a writer, line producer, field producer and senior producer during her time at FBN.
Before entering business news, Lisa worked as a segment producer at Court TV and in online ad sales at ABC. She is a gradate of NYU where she studied Broadcast Journalism.
Follow Lisa Villalobos on Twitter @LisaMVillalobos and LinkedIn lisavillalobos . CNBC Workshops
